title: Translation Technology-Supported Online Learning Program for Intercultural Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service/in-service teachers aiming to enhance intercultural communication competencies, featuring online collaborative activities using smartphone-based language translation technology.

learning_goals: Learners can explain key concepts related to multicultural traditions and customs with over 85% accuracy
Learners can conduct effective cross-cultural discussion with peer groups from at least three countries using language translation technology
Learners can identify at least two linguistic/non-linguistic barriers in intercultural interactions and propose response strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
